education.title: CM’s Scholarship Scheme
education.description: A fixed annual scholarship of ₹6,000 provided to students from Class XI up to PhD level with no income ceiling.

education.title: Meghalaya Post-Matric Scholarship
education.description: Financial aid for SC/ST/OBC students in Class 11 and above, covering tuition fees and monthly maintenance allowances.

education.title: Free Studentship Scheme
education.description: Covers tuition fees for students from Class 11 through Degree levels who are not receiving other central scholarships.

education.title: Border Areas Scholarship
education.description: Specialized grants for SC/ST students residing in notified border areas to support post-matric studies.

health.title: Megha Health Insurance Scheme (MHIS VI)
health.description: Universal health coverage providing up to ₹5.3 Lakhs per family annually for secondary and tertiary hospitalisation.

health.title: CM Care+ Scheme
health.description: A top-up scheme providing additional financial assistance for high-end critical care treatments exceeding standard MHIS limits.

health.title: Janani Shishu Suraksha Karyakaram (JSSK)
health.description: Cashless delivery and care for pregnant women and sick newborns, including free drugs, diagnostics, and transport.

health.title: Rashtriya Bal Swasthya Karyakram (RBSK)
health.description: Health screening and early intervention for children up to 18 years covering defects, diseases, and deficiencies.

government.title: CM-Elevate (Regional Transport)
government.description: Subsidies for commercial vehicles to improve rural-urban connectivity and promote transport entrepreneurship.

government.title: PMAY-G (Meghalaya)
government.description: Financial assistance of approximately ₹1.3 Lakh for rural families to convert 'kucha' houses into permanent homes.

government.title: FOCUS+ (Livelihood)
government.description: Direct financial grants to Producer Groups and individual farmers to scale up agricultural and allied activities.

government.title: MGNREGA (Meghalaya)
government.description: A flagship program guaranteeing 100 days of wage employment per financial year to every rural household.
